spatial_accuracy.notes: General layout is highly consistent with the source. Major deductions for the omission of several internal doors (notably Bedroom-3 and Toilet-4 access) and the translation of the 'Deck' into an enclosed hallway-like structure rather than an open balcony.

structural_fidelity.notes: Excellent adherence to clean background and no text/UI constraints. All rooms are represented, though the structural interpretation of the deck/balcony railings is overly solid, looking more like full walls.

furniture_mapping.notes: Block-style furniture mirrors the plan well. Kitchen counters, beds, and living room seating are accurately placed. Minor scale issues with the dining chairs relative to the table.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Near perfect execution of the requested style. Correct isometric camera angle, clean low-poly geometry, and soft ambient lighting with no photorealistic textures.

detected_errors.description: Missing internal swing doors for Bedroom-3, Toilet-4, and the transition between the lobby and living area.
The 'Deck' area is missing its open-air quality; the railing is rendered as a solid thick wall, distorting the spatial intent of the outdoor space.
Hallucinated solid wall sections where sliding glass doors should be, particularly leading to the deck/balcony areas.
